short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes The Wild Project's spam videos from your youtube feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that checks if a video from The Wild Project is a short extract from a complete episode. If so, the extension removes the video from your subscription feed, avoiding the spam of sliced videos from this channel.
